paragraphs: ðŸ‘‹ Welcome! Director of Analytics with 7 years of experience in data science. I turn complex problems into structured solutions and applications. I am enthusiastic about LLM and Generative AI, and confirmly believe they will reshape the way we think and talk.

items.name: AI Agent for Due Diligence
description: Built a Python-based multi-agent LLM due diligence system that assesses people's financial stability and risk profile.     |

Orchestrated an end-to-end workflow that ingests people's data, expands the knowledge base via external APIs and internal documents, applies a LlamaIndex-based RAG over it, and runs an iterative critique-and-revision agent loop to produce high-quality summaries.     |
Delivered interactive reports through a Streamlit-based web application.

items.name: 3D U-Net Tumor Detection System
description: Built a Python-based 3D U-Net model that ingests 3D images and automatically highlights potential regions of interest for cancer detection.     |
Designed a closed-loop workflow using REST APIs for feedback on model correctness and model retraining.

items.name: ML-Driven Trading Strategy
description: Built a data collection engine that pulls public market data via APIs and alternative data via Python web scraping (Selenium, Scrapy), storing all datasets in cloud-hosted relational and nonrelational databases.     |

Engineered multi-frequency features (daily, weekly, etc.) and applied Gaussian regression to align signals on a monthly horizon before training a hybrid gradient-boosted tree and LSTM model to forecast financial assets performance.     |
Ran systematic backtests and monitored both {regression and classification metrics after deployment, with the trading algorithm outperforming its benchmark by approximately 2.2%.

items.name: Multimodal Hateful Meme Detection
description: Developed a multimodal hateful meme detection system using a teacherâ€“student framework, combining vision and text signals to classify harmful content.     |
Trained a student model with a SigLIP2 vision encoder, DeBERTa-v3 text encoder, cross-attention fusion, and a gated modality controller to integrate image and text information.     |
Distilled supervision from a Qwen2.5-VL-7B teacher model, leveraging teacher-generated information with a combined BCE, KL-divergence, and contrastive losses.     |
Achieved 0.7 AUC and 65% accuracy on the held-out test set.

responsibilities: January 2023 - December 2025: Senior Operations Research Analyst
